name: Entei & Raikou LEGEND

attacks.name: Detonation Spin
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy attached to Entei & Raikou LEGEND.

attacks.name: Thunder Fall
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Entei & Raikou LEGEND. This attack does 80 damage to each Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers (both yours and your opponent’s). This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

rule_box:
Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Entei & Raikou LEGEND.
When this Pokémon has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
